data.title: Ndc Temenos Building New Beginnings
data.meta_description: Ndc Temenos Building New Beginnings - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. BUILDING NEWBEGINNINGSNDC -TEMENOS ‘T24 User Group’ PakistanDecember 06, 2010

2. The Journey So Far... (2000-2010)NDC becomes local agent for Temenos in Pakistan Sep 2000.

3. Temenossigns State Bank of Pakistan & inducts NDC Consultants on project.

4. SBP project completed by NDC in 2005.

5. NDC signs Meezan Bank for T24 Treasury and takes it Live within 4 months.

6. Temenos signs Bank Alfalah and Allied Bank in 2006 with NDC providing implementation services for T24.The Journey So Far... (2000-2010)MeezanBank, JS Bank, Atlas Bank & NIB Bank sign up for T24 services contract with NDC.

7. Silk Bank signs up for T24 in 2008.

8. Both Atlas and JS Bank Live in 2008.

9. MeezanBank, NIB Bank and Bank Al Falah Live in 2009. Allied Bank & Silk Bank Live in 2010.The New Journey... (2011 Onwards)NDC signs contract with Jacquard Systems for implementation of National Islamic Bank – Iraq (Baghdad) in June 2010. The bank is going Live on T24 on Dec 15, 2010.

10. NDC signs contracts for T24 consultancy with United National Bank, Abu Dhabi & Finance House, Abu Dhabi.

11. NDC signs up as Temenos Regional Partner in Dec 2010 (M.E.& Africa).

12. NDC establishes NDC entity in Dubai to cover the region 2010.

13. NDC House opens for business to provide a custom designed facility for all NDC businesses including a Development Center for T24.NDC -TEMENOS ‘T24 User Group’ PakistanFirst NDC -TEMENOS ‘T24 User Group’ Pakistan

14. Temenos opens Office in Pakistan

15. NDC enhances Partnership with Temenos to Regional Services Partner – MEANDC -TEMENOS ‘T24 User Group’ PakistanThe objective of the User Group is to communicate how NDC and Temenos can: Provide value-added services to our users.

16. Create a forum where all users may share successes, issues and concerns not only among themselves, but with NDC and Temenos.

17. Provide an environment for accurate and timely dissemination of information about Temenos products and services. NDC -TEMENOS ‘T24 User Group’ PakistanCont.Provide a channel for users to receive important information regarding changes in the local and international banking market.

18. Influence the direction of the products and services offered by Temenos for the benefit of the user community.

19. Have direct interaction and meetings with Temenos personnel.NDC -TEMENOS ‘T24 User Group’ PakistanSuggestions for User Group: NDC-Temenos will make this an Annual Event.

20. NDC will create a T24 User Group Portal for Pakistan where information and suggestions for common interest may be shared.

21. Each Pakistani T24 User Bank host a quarterly meeting of the User Group on a rotational basis.NDC – Regional Services Partner of TEMENOSNDC Outreach – Middle east & AfricaUAE

35. 7 Temenos – T24 Clients

36. Largest Team of Core Banking Application Implementers.

37. 80+ Consultants inclusive of Business, Technical and Roll-out Specialists.Project ManagementSupport Services - NAMSHelp Desk
